examples.text: The politician was accused of <w>currying</w> favor with the local business owners to gain votes.
She is in the kitchen <w>currying</w> the vegetables for tonight's dinner.

senses.sense_definition: The technique of converting a function that takes multiple arguments into a sequence of functions that each take a single argument.

examples.text: In functional programming, <w>currying</w> allows developers to create specialized functions from more general ones.
The process of <w>currying</w> transforms a function with many parameters into a chain of simpler functions.
